0.2.0.name: wordpress/content-bootstrap
0.2.0.description:
Apply twitter bootstrap css under the content area only.

This plugin maintained on GitHub.

Some features

  • Apply twitter bootstrap css to the content.
  • Add style button to Visula Editor.
  • Allow you to use bootstrap css with almost all themes.

Translators

  • Japanese(ja) - Takayuki Miyauchi

Please contact to me.

  • http://wpist.me/ (en)
  • http://firegoby.jp/ (ja)
  • @miya0001 on twitter.
  • https://github.com/miya0001/simple-map

Contributors

  • Takayuki Miyauchi
